QuestData.Title: Gruesome, But Necessary
QuestData.Description: Our elders say that these vrykul may be able to rise from the dead; not unlike the walking dead you call the Scourge, but a different kind of undeath.$B$BWe should not take any chances.$B$BHere, take my machete. As we move through this place, carve up the remains of the vrykul that we slay.$B$BI spent the morning sharpening it, so it should cleave even through their thick bones.
QuestData.LogDescription: The Winterhoof Brave has asked you to use The Brave's Machete to dismember 20 Vrykul of the Winterskorn tribe at Skorn.
QuestData.CompletionText: These vrykul have strange customs, would you not agree, $n?
QuestData.RewardText: Have you done that before? Your skill with my machete seemed practiced.$B$B<The brave looks at you warily.>$B$BI'll take it back from you now, $c.
